actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964.

summary.text: Revises eligibility requirements and the portion of income to be paid for food coupons under the Food Stamp Act of 1964. Limits the price of food stamps to the price in effect on January 1, 1975 or 25 percent of household income, whichever is less. Authorizes the use of food coupons for the purchase of prepared meals which are delivered to disabled individuals by a public agency or non-profit organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964.
